markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Remember Your Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=2222) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 40</row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

</column>

---

During your training to become a Pathfinder Agent you were schooled on a wide variety of creatures you might encounter, and you can think back to that training to gain crucial insight in times of need. Attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about a creature you can see, adding your level as a proficiency bonus if you are untrained (rather than 0). If you roll a failure (but not a critical failure) on this check, you get a success instead.
name: Remember Your Training
